data.text: @kevinmuir Ads based on past search results? 😂
@Meursau05433501 @kevinmuir @PatrickCeresna Thanks. This is a great tagline "Smanx - live like you've lost a bet."
@John_J_Ahearn @42macroDDale Well, trust me; you’re not.  I feel like Alec Baldwin between the Marrying Man and 30-rock. https://t.co/CmxYtjSMDj
@42macroDDale @kevinmuir I've been back into the office a few times and I feel like the only fat ass that put on weight during covid. 😂
@Gusmaia1 @kevinmuir @PatrickCeresna Problem is they would both try to lose so they could strut around in their smanx and tell anyone who notices that they are only doing it cause they lost a bet.
@kevinmuir I think that wearing a Smanx (verbal trademark for spanx-for-men) shoud be a stake on the "skin on the game" segment. @PatrickCeresna
@kevinmuir I'll probably never forgive Twitter for this one. https://t.co/sXOn0WziCx
@kevinmuir Mine haven’t done that since the 3rd grade! https://t.co/Mqof6iHlMf
